description:
Devoted to helping you obtain the justice you deserve following a preventable tragedy caused by someone else's negligence, the attorneys at Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., in Montrose, Colorado, are fully prepared to do whatever we can to increase your chances of recovering the maximum amount of compensation you need during this difficult and uncertain time in your life.

Along with our Montrose location, our law firm has four more offices across the Western Slope, making us one of our region's most prominent personal injury and wrongful death practices. To date, we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including many multimillion-dollar awards. We have achieved this level of success by utilizing the full extent of our more than 80 years of combined legal experience coupled with our unrelenting dedication to those we serve.

When you work with us, you will receive highly personalized, compassionate representation at all turns so that you fully understand your options. Moreover, our lawyers have previously worked for insurance companies, so we have a wealth of knowledge and insight into the industry that helps us devise the most effective strategy possible toward helping you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages.

For more information on how our law firm can best serve you and your family at this time when you need it the most, you can contact Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., to schedule a free case evaluation. You can also speak to us over the phone or through teleconference so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety in today's trying environment.
